https://tmrev.io/movie/400865-Adventures in Architecture 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null British architectural historian Dan Cruickshank explores the world's most unusual and interesting buildings, structures and sites, believing that architecture and a culture's aspirations and beliefs are intertwined. Among his visits are the Leshan Giant Buddha in China, St. Catherine's Monastery in Egypt, Kizhi Island in Russia and Pompeii in Italy. Adventures in Architecture
